summary: Beetlejuice is a fun and spooky movie made by Tim Burton in 1988. It stars Alec Baldwin, Geena Davis, and Michael Keaton as a mischievous ghost named Beetlejuice. The story follows a couple who become ghosts and try to scare away the new people in their house with Beetlejuice's help. The movie has a unique style with dark humor and fantasy elements. It was very popular when it came out, winning awards and becoming a hit with fans. The success led to more Beetlejuice stories, including a TV show and video games. People still enjoy the strange and wonderful world of Beetlejuice today.
title: Beetlejuice
